title: Futbol Americas: 2022 MLS Cup is set: LAFC vs Philadelphia
description:
On Monday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez talked about the following topics:
Reaction to Philadelphia Union beating NYCFC to reach its first MLS Cup Final. What was the key to Union’s victory?
Reaction to LAFC reaching its first MLS Cup Final after defeating Austin FC at home. They will host the final. Has LAFC proved doubters wrong?
Analyze the question: Is the LAFC-Philadelphia final the DREAM FINAL?
Reaction to the report from The Athletic that Inter Miami is confident Lionel Messi will join next summer. Are you buying this report?
INJURY WATCH: Reaction to USMNT players being injured lately:
 Who can replace Weston McKennie. Herculez says that Brenden Aaronson is the right person.
  Reaction to Leeds United getting a crucial victory against Liverpool at Anfield. Did Jesse Marsch save his job with the win?
Welcomed Portland Thorns attacker RAQUEL “ROCKY” RODRIGUEZ, fresh off winning the NWSL Championship.
We talk about all things Liga MX final between Pachuca and Toluca. Pachuca won its 7th league title.
- Is Pachuca the best well-run team in Mexico?
- Which Pachuca player is more Europe ready?
- Veljko Paunovic was appointed new Chivas manager. Is he the right fit?
- Edson Álvarez finally talks about the reports that Chelsea wanted to sign him from AFC Ajax. He says he pushed hard for the move. Something, nothing or everything?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
